com.jme3.input.vr.oculus

Class OculusMouseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.input.vr.AbstractVRMouseManager
      • com.jme3.input.vr.oculus.OculusMouseManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VRMouseManager

    public class OculusMouseManager
extends AbstractVRMouseManager
    A class dedicated to the mouse handling within Oculus Rift based VR experience.

    • Method Detail

      • updateAnalogAsMouse

        public void updateAnalogAsMouse(int inputIndex,
                                AnalogListener mouseListener,
                                java.lang.String mouseXName,
                                java.lang.String mouseYName,
                                float tpf)
        Description copied from interface: VRMouseManager
        Update analog controller as it was a mouse controller.
        Parameters:
        inputIndex - the index of the controller attached to the VR system.
        mouseListener - the JMonkey mouse listener to trigger.
        mouseXName - the mouseX identifier.
        mouseYName - the mouseY identifier
        tpf - the time per frame.
